body: It's Japanese police very likely the gun was unloaded anyways so he really didn't stand a chance at all and of course one cop can't do much with 5-6 well built criminals it's common sense this ain't no hero comic it's reality Japanese police is just built like that they can't do a lot of anything unlike say American police
@Janus22 my thought exactly, this is some stupid hentai logic at played here, even if he's outnumbered, the fact that he has an advantages and not used it is pure retardation
So the guy had a gun, pointed the gun at the group... and didnt do nothing? This is really hentai logic at its peak lmao
I assume cops are trained in self defense and in detaining someone instead of shooting them. But this is hentai, so cops here are basically weak and fragile.
U dont even need a word to describe a pain
